snippet.title: Detective: Ritual of the Sea - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Detective: Ritual of the Sea is an action-adventure cyberpunk detective game developed by InterStudio. Players will work to solve criminal cases in a gritty world to unearth dark secrets long untold. Use advanced future tech to solve criminal puzzles, reconstruct crime scenes, and analyze the evidence to get to the bottom of the case. Make dialogue choices and use deductive reasoning in Detective: Ritual of the Sea, releasing at a later date for PC with a demo available now as part of Steam Next Fest. 

Check out the game on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2657240/Detective_Ritual_of_the_Sea/

#IGN #Gaming #DetectiveRitualOfTheSea
